name: SunnyLand - FoxTrot
description:
Hey guys! I am super excited to bring you another game! This is a platformer I have been working on for a while.... but it is finally done! I really hope you enjoy! It has 5 large levels plus hidden rooms and lots of surprises in it! The fox runs through beautiful grasslands and explores in tunnels and over hills. This also comes with a mobile version! Tell me what you think in the comments! You can check out my other games here: https://astragamesstudios.itch.io/

I really appreciate donations and hope you have fun with this game!

Cheers! 😎
